grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 襟懐【キンカイ】(one's) inner thoughts, feelings
襟度【キンド】magnanimity, generosity, welcoming personality
開襟【カイキン】unbuttoning a collar, opening up (one's heart), open-necked shirt
kun reading compounds: 襟【えり】collar, lapel, neckband, neck, nape of the neck, scruff of the neck
襟巻き【えりまき】muffler (often fur), scarf, comforter
台襟【だいえり】neckband (of a shirt)
掛け襟【かけえり】protective collar on kimono or bed clothes
